name: officedev-microsoft-teams-samples-graph-change-notification-team-channel
title: Graph Change Notification Team/Channel
shortDescription: This sample application showcases how to post notifications in Microsoft Teams when users create, edit, or delete teams and channels using Microsoft Graph and C#.
longDescription: This application demonstrates the use of team and channel subscriptions to send notifications for any create, edit, or delete actions in Microsoft Teams. It utilizes the Graph API, incorporates RSC permissions, and allows interaction through a Teams tab for a comprehensive user experience.
